text: Mnogobozhniki govoryat: «Yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to ni my, ni nashi ottsy ne stali by poklonyat'sya nichemu, krome Nego, i my ne stali by zapreshchat' chtolibo vopreki Yemu». Tak zhe postupali te, kotoryye zhili prezhde. Razve na poslannikov bylo vozlozheno chto-libo, krome yasnoy peredachi otkroveniya
